main.name: World of Prophecy
main.desc: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a Spellcaster-Type monster or a "Spellbook" Spell Card: You can target 2 "Spellbook" Spell Cards in your Graveyard; add those targets to your hand. You cannot Special Summon other monsters during the turn you activate this effect. When you add card(s) to your hand by this effect: You can reveal 4 "Spellbook" Spell Cards with different names in your hand; destroy all other cards on the field.

main.name: High Priestess of Prophecy
main.desc: You can reveal 3 "Spellbook" Spells in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Spellbook" Spell from your hand or GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.

main.name: Justice of Prophecy
main.desc: During your End Phase, if you have activated a "Spellbook" Spell Card previously this turn: You can banish this card from the field; add both 1 Level 5 or higher LIGHT or DARK Spellcaster-Type monster and 1 "Spellbook" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use the effect of "Justice of Prophecy" once per turn.

main.name: Temperance of Prophecy
main.desc: During your Main Phase, if you have activated a "Spellbook" Spell Card previously this turn: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher LIGHT or DARK Spellcaster-Type monster from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon another Level 5 or higher monster during the turn you activate this effect.

main.name: Spellbook Magician of Prophecy
main.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Add 1 "Spellbook" Spell from your Deck to your hand.

main.name: Spellbook Star Hall
main.desc: Each time a "Spellbook" Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card. All Spellcaster-Type monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Spell Counter on this card. When this card with Spell Counter(s) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can add 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your Deck to your hand, whose Level is less than or equal to the number of Spell Counters that were on this card.

main.name: Spellbook of Life
main.desc: Banish 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your Graveyard and reveal 1 other "Spellbook" Spell Card in your hand to target 1 Spellcaster-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position and equip it with this card. The equipped monster's Level is increased by the Level of the monster that was banished for this card's activation. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Life" per turn.

main.name: The Grand Spellbook Tower
main.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, if you have a Spellcaster-Type monster on your side of the field or in your Graveyard: You can place 1 "Spellbook" Spell Card from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck, except "The Grand Spellbook Tower", then draw 1 card. When this card in your possession is destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand or Deck whose Level is less than or equal to the number of "Spellbook" Spell Cards in your Graveyard.

main.name: Dark Hole
main.desc: Destroy all monsters on the field.

main.name: Spellbook of Eternity
main.desc: Target 1 of your banished "Spellbook" Spell Cards, except "Spellbook of Eternity"; add that target to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Eternity" per turn.

main.name: Spellbook of Power
main.desc: Target 1 Spellcaster monster you control; this turn, it gains 1000 ATK. And if it does, each time it destroys an opponent's monster by battle this turn: You can add 1 "Spellbook" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Power" per turn.

main.name: Spellbook of Secrets
main.desc: Add 1 "Spellbook" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Spellbook of Secrets". You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Secrets" per turn.

main.name: Spellbook of the Master
main.desc: If you control a Spellcaster-Type monster: You can reveal 1 other "Spellbook" card in your hand, then target 1 "Spellbook" Normal Spell Card in your Graveyard, except "Spellbook of the Master"; this card's effect becomes that target's effect. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of the Master" per turn.

main.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
main.desc: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

main.name: Spellbook of Fate
main.desc:
If you control a Spellcaster-Type monster: You can banish up to 3 "Spellbook" Spell Cards from your Graveyard; apply this effect, depending on the number of Spell Cards banished for this card's activation. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Fate" per turn.
● 1: Return 1 Set Spell/Trap Card on the field to the hand.
● 2: Change 1 monster on the field to face-down Defense Position or face-up Attack Position.
● 3: Banish 1 card your opponent controls.

main.name: Spellbook of Wisdom
Mirror Force
main.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

extra.name: Hierophant of Prophecy
extra.desc:
2 Level 7 Spellcaster-Type monsters
 Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy Spell/Trap Card(s) your opponent controls, up to the number of "Spellbook" Spell Cards in your Graveyard.

extra.name: Crowley, the First Propheseer
extra.desc:
2 Spellcaster monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can reveal 3 "Spellbook" cards with different names from your Deck, and your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to add to your hand, also shuffle the rest into your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Crowley, the First Propheseer" once per turn. Each turn, 1 Level 5 or higher Spellcaster monster you Normal Summon can be Summoned without Tributing.
